Advance Product Low Stock Alert Notification Odoo App

Multi Warehouse Product Low Stock Notification Odoo Apps

Product Low Stock Alerts on Based on Warehouse Odoo Apps

Advance Product Low Stock Alert Notification odoo app helps users to get email notification for low stock product based on on hand or forecasted quantity. Users can also set notification mode based on global, individual, or reorder rule based. Users can set minimum quantity for product and product variant, Only configured users will get email notification for low stock products. It also allows generating stock alerts based on multi warehouses.

In Odoo warehouse management this Product Low Stock Notification Odoo apps is useful to give the user update of product's on hand quantity or forecast quantity via mail. Odoo User can get list of products with their current quantity and their required quantity in stock inventory as alert in email minimum stock Reminder.Easily define low stock level global for all products or individual product. On basis of type of mode either global or forecast it will generate email if any product low stock Reminder Notify for product inventory in warehouse app in Odoo ERP.

Features

Low Stock Notification/Remainder.

User will get low stock product notification remainder by email.

Send email to Configured User with Attachment.

Only configured user will get low stock product notification with attachment.

Set Product Minimum Quantity.

User can set minimum stock quantity for product.

Set Product Variant Minimum Quantity.

User can also set minimum stock quantity for product variant.

Notification for Global, Individual or Reorder Rule based Product.

User can send notification as global for all the products, individual for every product or based on reordering rules.

Notification for On Hand or Forecast Quantity.

User will notify based on on hand or forecast quantity of product.

Multi Warehouse Low Stock Notification.

User will get low stock notification for multiple warehouses.

Warehouse wise Low Stock Quantity.

User can find low stock quantity with warehouse on email and attached pdf report.
Demo Request Video Tutorial

Company Configuration

Under Settings > User & Companies > Companies menu user have enable "Low Stock Notification?" option under "Low Stock Notification" tab.

User Configuration

To get low stock product notification user have to enable "Notify User" under user preferences.

Global Product Stock Notification Configuration

To get notification for global product on hand or forecasted minimum quantity user have to select "Min Quantity Based On - Global for all product" and "Apply On - Product".

Additional Cron Features

User can set and run cron manually for email sending function.

Low Stock Notification Email with Multi Warehouse

User can see low stock notification email remainder sent to user with product minimum quantity and warehouse wise quantity.

Low Stock Notification Email Attachment

User can see product variant minimum quantity low stock report attached with email.

Individual Product Stock Notification Configuration

To get notification for global product on hand or forcast minimum quantity user have to select "Min Quantity Based On - Global for all product" and "Apply On - Product".

Set Product Min Quantity

On product form view user have to set minimum quantity for specific product.

Low Stock Notification Email with Multi Warehouse

User can see product minimum quantity low stock notification email remainder to notify user with multiple warehouses.

Low Stock Notification Email Attachment

User can see product minimum quantity with warehouse on low stock report attached with email.

Reorder Rules Product Stock Notification Configuration

To get notification for product on hand or forcast minimum quantity based on reorder rules user have to select "Min Quantity Based On - Reorder Rules" and "Apply On - Product".

Reordering Rules

User have create reordering rules for product and set "Minimum Quantity" for product.

Low Stock Notification Email with Multi Warehouse

User can see product minimum quantity low stock report with multi warehouse attached with email.

Low Stock Notification Email Attachment

User can see product minimum quantity low stock report attached with email.
